greenness.about: This map shows mean annual greenness for the period {YEAR_START} - {YEAR_END}. Darker green areas indicate more abundant and healthier vegetation throughout the year. Yellow colors indicate areas with bare soil or sparce vegetation.
greenness.title: Greenness

greenness_trend.about: This map shows the changes in annual greenness for the period {YEAR_START} - {YEAR_END}. Green areas have increased vegetation abundance or health during the period, yellow show stable areas and purple areas in which vegetation abundance or health has declined.
greenness_trend.title: Greenness Trend
